note:
college professor in the U.S. Midwest (all views mine); author of "Bike Battles: A History of Sharing the American Road" / "Las Batallas de la Bici." Shop intern, historian of urban and environmental policy, gravel grinder, Reacting to the Past instructor, slow roadie, interim chair, everyday cyclist, Americanist, #biketooter.
Header: bike tools hanging on a wall
Avatar: a man stands in front of an oversized flag of the state of Wisconsin; the flag is very blue, the state perhaps less so.
